languages.text: {n}Продираясь сквозь путанную речь старицы, вы осознаете несколько важных вещей: Каллигос Винтерскейл действительно спустился на мир. Судя по всему, он потерял псайкера в боях с ксеносами и заменил его на жреца с пси-способностями. Ушел вместе с ним в леса, после чего местная флора взбунтовалась. А жрец, оказавшись в гуще лесного лабиринта, не смог ее усмирить без ритуала, проводимого исключительно в поселении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Продираясь сквозь путанную речь старицы, вы осознаете несколько важных вещей: Каллигос Винтерскейл действительно спустился на мир. Судя по всему, он потерял псайкера в боях с ксеносами и заменил его на жреца с пси-способностями. Ушел вместе с ним в леса, после чего местная флора взбунтовалась. А жрец, оказавшись в гуще лесного лабиринта, не смог ее усмирить без ритуала, проводимого исключительно в поселении.{/n}

languages.text: {n}After making sense of the elder's speech, you realise several important things: Calligos Winterscale did, in fact, make planetfall on Quetza Temer. It would seem that he lost a psyker in battles with xenos and replaced him with a priest possessing psychic powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which drove the local flora into a frenzy, and the priest could not calm it in the middle of the forest labyrinth because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Продираясь сквозь путанную речь старицы, вы осознаете несколько важных вещей: Каллигос Винтерскейл действительно спустился на мир. Судя по всему, он потерял псайкера в боях с ксеносами и заменил его на жреца с пси-способностями. Ушел вместе с ним в леса, после чего местная флора взбунтовалась. А жрец, оказавшись в гуще лесного лабиринта, не смог ее усмирить без ритуала, проводимого исключительно в поселении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After making heads or tails of the elderly priestess's speech, you realize several important things. Calligos Winterscale did, in fact, descend upon this world. He seems to have lost a psyker in the fights with xenos and replaced him with a priest with psychic-powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which made the local fauna go wild. And the priest could not pacify it in the middle of the forest labyrinth, because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}

He seems to have lost a psyker in the fights with xenos and replaced him with a priest with psychic-powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which made the local fauna go wild. And the priest could not pacify it in the middle of the forest labyrinth, because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}

It would seem that he lost a psyker in battles with xenos and replaced him with a priest possessing psychic powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which drove the local flora into a frenzy, and the priest could not calm it in the middle of the forest labyrinth because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}

{n}After making sense of the elder's speech, you realise several important things: Calligos Winterscale did, in fact, make planetfall on Quetza Temer. It would seem that he lost a psyker in battles with xenos and replaced him with a priest possessing psychic powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which drove the local flora into a frenzy, and the priest could not calm it in the middle of the forest labyrinth because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras buscar el sentido del relato de la anciana, sí entiendes un par de conceptos fundamentales: Calligos Winterscale aterrizó en Quetza Temer, después de todo. Por lo visto perdió a un psíquico luchando contra los xenos y lo reemplazó con un sacerdote dotado de poderes psíquicos. Luego se aventuraron en el bosque, lo que hizo que la flora local enloqueciese. Y el sacerdote no pudo apaciguarla en mitad del laberinto boscoso porque el ritual solamente puede realizarse en la aldea.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After making sense of the elder's speech, you realise several important things: Calligos Winterscale did, in fact, make planetfall on Quetza Temer. It would seem that he lost a psyker in battles with xenos and replaced him with a priest possessing psychic powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which drove the local flora into a frenzy, and the priest could not calm it in the middle of the forest labyrinth because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aunque no encuentras pies ni cabeza al relato de la anciana sacerdotisa, sí entiendes un par de conceptos fundamentales: Calligos Winterscale aterrizó en este planeta, después de todo. Por lo visto perdió a un psíquico luchando contra los xenos y lo reemplazó con un sacerdote dotado de poderes psíquicos. Luego se aventuraron en el bosque, lo que hizo que la fauna local enloqueciese. Y el sacerdote no pudo apaciguarla en mitad del laberinto boscoso porque el ritual solamente puede realizarse en la aldea.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你梳理着老祭司的这番话，意识到几件重要的事情。首先，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔确实降落到了格扎尔特默这颗行星，与异形战斗的过程中似乎损失了一位灵能者，于是他带走了一位拥有灵能力量的祭司，填补了那个空缺。随后，他们闯进了森林里，导致当地的植物群落陷入了狂暴状态。安抚仪式只能在村中进行，但能举行仪式的祭司身处森林迷宫中央，无法安抚那些发狂的植物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After making sense of the elder's speech, you realise several important things: Calligos Winterscale did, in fact, make planetfall on Quetza Temer. It would seem that he lost a psyker in battles with xenos and replaced him with a priest possessing psychic powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which drove the local flora into a frenzy, and the priest could not calm it in the middle of the forest labyrinth because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你梳理着老祭司的这番话，意识到几件重要的事情。首先，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔确实来到了这个世界，与异形战斗的过程中似乎损失了一位灵能者，于是他带走了一位拥有灵能力量的祭司，填补了那个空缺。随后，他们闯进了森林里，当地的动物群落陷入了狂暴状态。安抚仪式只能在村中进行，但能举行仪式的祭司身处森林迷宫中央，无法安抚那些发狂的动物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir déchiffré le discours de l'ancienne, vous comprenez plusieurs choses importantes : Calligos Winterscale est bien venu sur Quetza Temer. Il semble avoir perdu un psyker en combattant les xénos et l'a remplacé par un prêtre ayant des pouvoirs psychiques. Ils se sont ensuite aventurés dans la forêt, ce qui a enragé la faune locale, et le prêtre n'a pu la pacifier au cœur du labyrinthe, car le rituel ne peut être accompli qu'au village.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After making sense of the elder's speech, you realise several important things: Calligos Winterscale did, in fact, make planetfall on Quetza Temer. It would seem that he lost a psyker in battles with xenos and replaced him with a priest possessing psychic powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which drove the local flora into a frenzy, and the priest could not calm it in the middle of the forest labyrinth because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir déchiffré le discours abscons de la vieille prêtresse, vous comprenez plusieurs choses importantes : Calligos Winterscale est bien venu sur ce monde. Il semble avoir perdu un psyker en combattant les xénos et l'a remplacé par un prêtre ayant des pouvoirs psychiques. Ensuite, ils se sont aventurés dans la forêt, ce qui a enragé la faune locale, et le prêtre n'a pu la pacifier, car le rituel ne peut être accompli qu'au village.{/n}

languages.text: {n}年嵩の司祭の話を頭で理解した後、あなたはいくつかの重要なことに気づいた。すなわち、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは実際に、ケツァ・テメルに降り立ったということだ。彼は異種族との戦いで異能者を失い、その代わりにサイキック・パワーを持つ司祭をここで雇ったようだ。そして彼らは森に入り、現地の動物相を凶暴化させた。そして、司祭は森の迷宮の真ん中でそれをなだめることができなかった。なぜなら、儀式は村の中でしか行えないからだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After making sense of the elder's speech, you realise several important things: Calligos Winterscale did, in fact, make planetfall on Quetza Temer. It would seem that he lost a psyker in battles with xenos and replaced him with a priest possessing psychic powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which drove the local flora into a frenzy, and the priest could not calm it in the middle of the forest labyrinth because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}年嵩の司祭の話を頭で理解した後、あなたはいくつかの重要なことに気づいた。すなわち、カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは実際に、ケツァ・テメルに降り立ったということだ。彼は異種族との戦いで異能者を失い、その代わりにサイキック・パワーを持つ司祭をここで雇ったようだ。そして彼らは森に入り、現地の動物相を凶暴化させた。そして、司祭は森の迷宮の真ん中でそれをなだめることができなかった。なぜなら、儀式は村の中でしか行えないからだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem du die Worte der Alten entschlüsselt hast, werden dir mehrere wichtige Dinge klar: Calligos Winterzunder ist in der Tat auf Quetza Temer gelandet. Er scheint in den Kämpfen mit den Xenos einen Psioniker verloren und ihn durch einen Priester mit psychischen Kräften ersetzt zu haben. Dann sind sie in den Wald gezogen, was die örtliche Flora zur Raserei getrieben hat. Der Priester konnte sie inmitten des Waldlabyrinths nicht befrieden, weil das Ritual nur im Dorf durchgeführt werden kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After making sense of the elder's speech, you realise several important things: Calligos Winterscale did, in fact, make planetfall on Quetza Temer. It would seem that he lost a psyker in battles with xenos and replaced him with a priest possessing psychic powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which drove the local flora into a frenzy, and the priest could not calm it in the middle of the forest labyrinth because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem du die Worte der alten Priesterin einigermaßen verstanden hast, werden dir mehrere wichtige Dinge klar: Calligos Winterzunder ist in der Tat auf dieser Welt gelandet. Er scheint in den Kämpfen mit den Xenos einen Psioniker verloren und ihn durch einen Priester mit psychischen Kräften ersetzt zu haben. Dann sind sie in den Wald gegangen, weshalb die örtliche Fauna rasend geworden ist. Und der Priester konnte sie inmitten des Waldlabyrinths nicht befrieden, weil das Ritual nur im Dorf durchgeführt werden kann.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İhtiyarın konuşmasından bir anlam çıkarmanın ardından birçok önemli şeyi fark ediyorsun. Calligos Winterscale, gerçekten de Quetza Temer gezegenine iniş yapmış. Çatışmalarda bir ruhsezer kaybetmiş ve onun yerine ruhsezi gücüne sahip bir rahip almış gibi duruyor. Ardından ormana doğru yola koyulmuşlar. Bu da yerel florayı cinnetin eşiğine getirmiş. Rahip ise orman labirentinin ortasında florayı sakinleştirememiş çünkü ayin, yalnızca kasabada gerçekleştirilebilirmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After making sense of the elder's speech, you realise several important things: Calligos Winterscale did, in fact, make planetfall on Quetza Temer. It would seem that he lost a psyker in battles with xenos and replaced him with a priest possessing psychic powers. Then they ventured into the forest, which drove the local flora into a frenzy, and the priest could not calm it in the middle of the forest labyrinth because the ritual can only be conducted in the village.{/n}
